getEnzymesByIdPrefixes

public List<uk.ac.ebi.ep.search.model.EnzymeSummary> getEnzymesByIdPrefixes(List<String> queries,
                                                                            String defaultSpecies,
                                                                            Collection<String> speciesFilter)
                                                                     throws uk.ac.ebi.ep.search.exception.MultiThreadingException
Description copied from interface: IUniprotAdapter
Gets summaries of enzymes by their IDs.

Parameters:
queries - a list of UniProt ID prefixes (i.e. without the species suffix).
defaultSpecies - the species to use as default.
speciesFilter - the species used as filter.
Returns:
a list of enzyme summaries.
Throws:
uk.ac.ebi.ep.search.exception.MultiThreadingException
